short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WYM (Write Your Mind) is an intuitive extension designed for quickly jotting down thoughts and important information while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your ideas and keep your notes organized, whether you\'re a student, professional, or simply seeking efficiency. Download WYM and never let a brilliant thought slip away again !
